subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hunter-Reay coasted to his second straight IndyCar victory at Barber Motorsports Park in Birmingham, Ala., when the rain-shortened Honda Indy Grand Prix of Alabama finished under caution.
snippet: Ryan Hunter-Reay coasted to his second straight IndyCar victory at Barber Motorsports Park in Birmingham, Ala., when the rain-shortened Honda Indy Grand Prix of Alabama finished under caution.
